title: 10% performance regression on CuDNN convolution dispatch path
body_html: This PR #3666 introduces a 10% performance regression on the CuDNN convolution dispatch path. There is no single smoking gun, but it needs to be as fast as the old CuDNN code was. I spent this morning trying to fix it to no avail, so this is to remind me to fix it before next release.
body_text: This PR #3666 introduces a 10% performance regression on the CuDNN convolution dispatch path. There is no single smoking gun, but it needs to be as fast as the old CuDNN code was. I spent this morning trying to fix it to no avail, so this is to remind me to fix it before next release.
body: This PR https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3666 introduces a 10% performance regression on the CuDNN convolution dispatch path. There is no single smoking gun, but it needs to be as fast as the old CuDNN code was. I spent this morning trying to fix it to no avail, so this is to remind me to fix it before next release.
